<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Add a string attribute data and value.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// We always emit a reference to the string pool instead of immediate</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// strings so that DIEs have more predictable sizes. In the case of split</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// dwarf we emit an index into another table which gets us the static offset</Highlight></CodeLine>
